Sentencas: This study compared the technical -economic and life cycle environmental (LCA) performance of a bulk carrier, powered by different biofuels that could potentially be produced in Brazil, with a ship powered by low -sulfur fuel oil (LSFO).
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: Six biofuel pathways and two power systems (two-stroke diesel engine and solid oxide fuel cell) were evaluated.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: The technical -economic assessment estimated the minimum fuel selling price (MFSP), and the impacts on the levelized cost of shipping (LCOS).
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: All biofuels showed reductions ranging from 63.12% to 89.98% in GHG emissions per t.km compared to LSFO.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: Biofuels also performed better in terms of fine particulate matter formation and fossil resource scarcity, while results for the other environmental categories varied according to the production pathway.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: From an economic perspective, all biofuels showed higher MFSP (2.46-3.75 times) and LCOS (1.58-3.08 times) compared to LSFO.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: The results showed the potential of biofuels to reduce the carbon footprint and the economic challenges to overcome.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: In this sense, governmental programs and incentives can allow marine biofuels bridge the competitivity gap with fossil fuels.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil

Sentencas: In the short-term, the adoption of different strategies, such as offsetting schemes, may be necessary for the international shipping decarbonization.
Titulo: Technical-economic and environmental assessment of marine biofuels produced in Brazil
